short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple spotlight-like search through your bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to quickly search through all of your bookmarks in Chrome simply by typing a search phrase and navigating to any of the results matching your search term. Use "Alt+Enter" to open the bookmark in a new tab or "Enter" to open it in the current tab. This extension aims to be simple to allow you to open a bookmark with as few clicks as possible.
